UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A pan-coronavirus fusion inhibitor targeting the HR1 domain of human coronavirus spike.
Literature.Author: Xia S, et al.

Literature.Title: Peptide-Based Membrane Fusion Inhibitors Targeting HCoV-229E Spike Protein HR1 and HR2 Domains.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Xu W, Wang Q, Wang C, Hua C, Li W, Lu L, Jiang S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: SARS-CoV(IC50 F=>5µM),MERS-CoV(IC50 F=>5µM),HCoV-229E(IC50 F=0.13±0.02µM),HCoV-229E(IC50 REP=0.56µM),HCoV-NL63(IC50 F=0.51±0.06µM),HCoV-OC43(IC50 F=>5µM),Vesicular Stomatitis Virus (VSV)(IC50 F=>10µM),HCoV-229E PsV(IC50 I=0.53µM),HCoV-229E(IC50 REP=1.96µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma Huh7(0-10% Cytotoxicity=1000µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(0-10% Cytotoxicity=1000µM)
